content.text:
# KML Best Defender Award

The KML Best Defender Award () is an award for the top-tier professional basketball league in Estonia, the Korvpalli Meistriliiga.
Winners
{| class="wikitable"
|-
!Season !! Player !! Team
|-
|align="center"|2011–12
| Bamba Fall||BC Kalev/Cramo
|-
|align="center"|2012–13
| Martin Dorbek||TYCO Rapla
|-
|align="center"|2013–14
| Gregor Arbet||BC Kalev/Cramo
|-
|align="center"|2014–15
| Janar Talts||Tartu Ülikool/Rock
|-
|align="center"|2015–16
| Janar Talts||Tartu Ülikool/Rock
|-
|align="center"|2016–17
| Mihkel Kirves||Pärnu Sadam
|-
|align="center"|2017–18|| Mihkel Kirves||Pärnu Sadam
|-
|align="center"|2018–19|| Mihkel Kirves||Pärnu Sadam
|-
|align="center"|2020–21|| Märt Rosenthal||Pärnu Sadam
|}
